comes with many built-in security features but there are also a few extra features and enhancements that can be enabled manually to achieve an even higher degree of security. Here are some security tips and recommendations:
Activate Security Manager if using WAR distribution.
Enable HTTPS
Enable the "Secure" attribute for the session cookie
Enable HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS)
